aiPoweredCombat.title: AI-Powered Combat
aiPoweredCombat.description: Every battle is uniquely simulated with advanced AI, providing detailed combat logs and strategic insights.

trainChampions.title: Train Champions
trainChampions.description: Develop your gladiators' skills, equipment, and fighting styles to create unstoppable warriors.

manageLudus.title: Manage Your Ludus
manageLudus.description: Build and expand your training grounds, hire servants, and establish your reputation.

interactiveGladiators.title: Interactive Gladiators
interactiveGladiators.description: Talk to your warriors, learn their stories, and understand their motivations and fears.

exploreCity.title: Explore the City
exploreCity.description: Visit markets to buy gladiators, equipment, and resources. Discover hidden opportunities.

ludusWars.title: Ludus Wars
ludusWars.description: Engage in massive battles where all gladiators fight simultaneously. Dominate rival schools.
